3.name: Sol
3.text: "Um... um... First, I'll put this... here..."

4.name: Sol
4.text:
"I'll scatter the collected coins here... and
then, display the rest on top like this..."

6.name: Sol
6.text: "Yay! I did it! My nest is complete!"

8.name: Sol
8.text:
"Ooooo... happiness... It's like all the pleasures
of this world have been condensed into one
bliss..."

10.name: Narration
10.text:
※Dragons instinctively consider hoarding treasure
in their nests to be bliss, and the amount of
treasure also determines their status as a dragon.

11.name: Narration
11.text:
If the amount of treasure exceeds a certain level,
it is possible to level up. Additionally, by
repeating the process of leveling up, they will
undergo a \c[2]metamorphosis\c[0].

12.name: Narration
12.text:
By undergoing metamorphosis, the dragon's body
will grow about one size larger. The number of
adventurers it can carry on its back at once will
also increase, greatly boosting its fighting
power.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
Let's actively gather treasures and bring them
back to the nest!
